source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_SALES_OTHER_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sale_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesType
ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@ValidDateAndIdAdnNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIDandNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Other_Sales_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold)),not(isNull(Derived_Total_Units_Sold)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Net_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Cost)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@(ValidDateAndIdAdnNumbers, InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Other_Sales_Id = toInteger(Other_Sale_Id),
		Derived_Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_revenue = toDecimal(Sales_revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndIDandNumbers
InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbersErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers
ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Sales Other Id / Total Unit Sold / Sales Revenue / Sales Costs / Sales Net Revenie / Sales Net Revenue Per Unit/ Budget Sales Quantity / Budget Sales Revenue / Budget Sales Cost")) ~> InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbersErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalSalesType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Sale_Type_Code = Sale_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Sales_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type = Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Sales_Other]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Sales_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesOther
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		StagingChecksum,
		Sales_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalSalesOther derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Sale_Type_Code,Sales_UOM,Sales_Point,Total_Units_Sold,Sales_revenue,Sales_Cost,Sales_Net_Revenue,Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,Currency_Code,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Sales_Cost)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Other_Sale_Id = Other_Sale_Id,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Sale_Type_Code = Sale_Type_Code,
		Relation_Sales_UOM = Sales_UOM,
		Relation_Sales_Point = Sales_Point,
		Relation_Total_Units_Sold = Total_Units_Sold,
		Relation_Sales_revenue = Sales_revenue,
		Relation_Sales_Cost = Sales_Cost,
		Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue = Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Relation_Currency_Code = Currency_Code,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue = Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Cost = Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Sale_Type_Code,Sales_UOM,Sales_Point,Total_Units_Sold,Sales_revenue,Sales_Cost,Sales_Net_Revenue,Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,Currency_Code,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Sales_Cost)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Other_Sale_Id == Relation_Other_Sale_Id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingSalesOther@NewSalesOther select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Other_Sale_Id = toInteger(Other_Sale_Id),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_revenue = toDecimal(Sales_revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Net_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || 
Total_Units_Sold != Relation_Total_Units_Sold || 
Sales_revenue != Relation_Sales_revenue || 
Sales_Cost != Relation_Sales_Cost || 
Sales_Net_Revenue != Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue || 
Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit != Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit || 
Budget_Sales_Quantity != Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity || 
Budget_Sales_Revenue != Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue || 
Budget_Sales_Cost != Relation_Budget_Sales_Cost,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingSalesOther@(NewSalesOther, ChangedSalesOther, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingSalesOther@ChangedSalesOther derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id = Relation_Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name,
		Sales_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Other_Sale_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name,
		Sales_Type
	)) ~> UpserttRow
